unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyon! Zaroori hai, especially after that unseasonal rain in Maharashtra on 20/07/2023. Remember last year's cotton loss near Nagpur? PMFBY se kuch toh milega. Heard payouts are slow though, SBI wale babu need to speed things up. Check your policies before 31/08/2024. Even if it's just Rs. 500 premium, worth it. Jai Kisan! Saw the Kisan Vikas Patra rates, not bad, but insurance first at 10:00 AM! What say, Ramu kaka?
normalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyon! Zaroori hai, especially after that unseasonal rain in Maharashtra on twentieth july two thousand and twenty three. Remember last year's cotton loss near Nagpur? P M F B Y se kuch toh milega. Heard payouts are slow though, S B I wale babu need to speed things up. Check your policies before thirty first august two thousand and twenty four. Even if it's just rupee five hundred premium, worth it. Jai Kisan! Saw the Kisan Vikas Patra rates, not bad, but insurance first at ten A M! What say, Ramu kaka?
